textSub.name: tagline
textSub.string: Kids - never feed your fish uranium!

textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
Some of these poor minnows have eaten hazardous
 waste, turning them into poisonous mutants! They
 may look tasty, but don't eat the green fish!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
WATCH OUT FOR MUTANT FISH!
 Avoid the bright green fish. If you eat one
 you'll become disoriented! To recover, rapidly tap 
 the left mouse button until you return to normal.
